executable.title: Hierarchical Spherical Deformation for Cortical Surface Registration
executable.description: Please refer to the following paper for details: [1] Lyu et al., Hierarchical Spherical Deformation for Shape Correspondence, MICCAI 2018. [2] Lyu et al., Hierarchical Spherical Deformation for Cortical Surface Registration, Medical Image Analysis 2019.

directory.name: dirProperty
directory.description: provides a directory of property files

directory.name: dirSphere
directory.description: provides a directory of sphere files

directory.name: dirOutput
directory.description: provides a directory of output files

directory.name: dirLandmark
directory.description: provides a directory of landmark files

directory.name: dirCoeff
directory.description: provides a directory of previous spherical harmonics coefficient files

directory.name: dirSurf
directory.description: provides a directory of surface model files for location information

string-vector.name: listProperty
string-vector.description: provides a list of property files

string-vector.name: listSphere
string-vector.description: provides a list of sphere files

string-vector.name: listOutputCoeff
string-vector.description: provides a list of output coeff files

string-vector.name: listOutput
string-vector.description: provides a list of output sphere files

string-vector.name: listLandmark
string-vector.description: provides a list of landmark files

string-vector.name: listCoeff
string-vector.description: provides a list of previous spherical harmonics coefficient files

string-vector.name: listSurf
string-vector.description: provides a list of surface model files for location information

float.name: idprior
float.description: provides inverse of distortion prior for the regularization

integer.name: degree
integer.description: provides a degree of spherical harmonics decomposition

integer.name: maxIter
integer.description: provides the maxmum number of iterations

integer.name: icosa
integer.description: provides a icosahedron subdivision level for uniform sampling points

float.name: weightLoc
float.description: provides a weighting factor of location information

string-vector.name: listFilter
string-vector.description: provides a list of suffix filters to select desired property files

string.name: tmpVariance
string.description: provides a prior of feature variance (only works on pairwise registration)

boolean.name: realtimeCoeff
boolean.description: enables real-time coefficient writing whenever the cost function is minimized, which may lead to significant IO overhead

boolean.name: noguess
boolean.description: disables an initial guess for rigid alignment

integer.name: nThreads
integer.description: set the number of OpenMP cores

integer-vector.name: listFixedSubj
integer-vector.description: specifies indices (starting from 0) of the subjects not being deformed during the optimization (typically for template models)
